column2: "Rangers and Assault Rifles go together like two peas in a pod."
"Most people think of rifles as purely ranged weapons, but because you can shoot on the move, they're actually good at all ranges."
"It's a little short on firepower, but that's not so bad... Heheh. You just have to aim for weak spots."
"So... Will you give rifles a try? If so, you can have this one. It's one of Lisa's, and has quite a story behind it."
"The best way to get up to speed with it is to get some hands-on experience. You know, learn by really tormenting hostiles!"
"Assault Rifles are standard ranged weapons that even beginners can handle with ease, perfect for attacking from a distance."
"Try basic assault rifle attacks and Photon Arts for yourself."
